get.summary: Returns the current document progress of all process instances started.
get.description:
Includes process instances started by:
- Anyone

200.description: The progress reports have been returned

get.summary: Retrieve a document that has been previously written to the ledger.
get.description: Document ids are not the same as step ids.  Each document in a step is stored in different transaction and then linked to the step transaction.

parameters.name: transactionId
parameters.description: The transaction id that the document has been stored in.

parameters.name: registerId
parameters.description: The register the document has been saved to.

200.description: The document has been found and returned successfully.

404.description: No document (transcation) exists with provided id.

post.summary: Create a new instance of a proceess schema on the ledger.
post.description: This will result in the first actor in the process being sent the first step to complete.

parameters.name: registerId
parameters.description: The id of the register.

get.summary: Returns the processes that are available to be started by the user.
get.description:
There are two cases where a process can be started by the caller. 
1. The actor for step 1 of the schema is SingleUserWallet.
2. The caller is a member of group wallet for Step 1 of the schema.

parameters.name: registerId
parameters.description: The id of the register.

200.description: The processes available to start were returned.

application/json.title: A Process Schema
application/json.description: This is a process schema description

get.summary: Return all process instances for the supplied schema ids.

parameters.name: registerId
parameters.description: The registerId to find the instances from.

parameters.name: schemaIds
parameters.description: Comma separated list of schemas to return the instances for.

parameters.name: registerId
parameters.description: The registerId to find the instances from.

get.summary: Returns the current progress of all process instances started by the caller.
get.description:
Includes process instances started by:
- The callers single user wallet
- A group wallet which the caller is a member of.

200.description: The progress reports have been returned

get.summary: Returns the current progress of a single instance.

200.description: The progress report have been returned

get.summary: Returns all saved, published and archived processes schema summaries.

parameters.name: registerId
parameters.description: The register id to get processes from.

200.description: All schemas have been returned successfully.

application/json.title: A Process Schema
application/json.description: This is a process schema description

403.description: Caller is not authorised to call this endpoint.

post.description: If this is the first time saving the schema the id should be set to "FFFFFFFF-FFFF-FFFF-FFFF-FFFFFFFFFFFF", this will result in a new schema being saved.  Id an existing id is provided then any existing schema with the id will be updated.

parameters.name: registerId
parameters.description: The register id to save the process to.

parameters.name: schema
parameters.description: The Process Schema to be saved.

400.description: Submitted schema is not valid for saving.

403.description: Caller is not authorised to call this endpoint.

get.summary: Returns the latest version of the schema, saved, published or archived, with the given id.
get.description:
If the schema has been published it will return the latest published version.
if it has not been published it will return the latest saved version

parameters.name: registerId
parameters.description: The register id to fetch the process from.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the schema to fetch.

403.description: Caller is not authorised to call this endpoint.

delete.description: This is irreversible.  Only schemas that have not yet been published can be saved.

parameters.name: registerId
parameters.description: The register id to delete the process from.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the schema to delete

204.description: The schema has been deleted successfully.

401.description: User is not authenticated to call this endpoint.

403.description: User is not authorised to call this endpoint.

get.summary: Returns the process schema for the given version ID

parameters.name: registerId
parameters.description: The register id to fetch the process from.

parameters.name: schemaVersionId
parameters.description: The version id of the process to fetch.

200.description: The schema with the given version.

404.description: The schema with the given version could not be found.

get.summary: Get all publishable claims from all published schemas.

parameters.name: registerId
parameters.description: The register id to fetch processes from.

200.description: The claims have been returned successfully.

403.description: Caller is not authorised to call this endpoint.

get.summary: Get all publishable attestations from all published schemas.

parameters.name: registerId
parameters.description: The register id to fetch processes from.

200.description: The attestations have been returned successfully.

403.description: Caller is not authorised to call this endpoint.

post.summary: Publish a provided schema so that instances can be started and executed.

parameters.name: registerId
parameters.description: The register id to publish the process to.

parameters.name: schema
parameters.description: The schema to publish

200.description: The schema has been published succesfully.

400.description: The schema is not valid for publishing.

403.description: Caller is not authorised to call this endpoint.

get.summary: Query public data added in all steps.

parameters.name: registerId
parameters.description: The register to search in.

parameters.name: querystring
parameters.description: The string to search for.

get.summary: Returns the actions that are currently available for the caller to complete.

parameters.name: registerId
parameters.description: The id of the register.

200.description: The next available actions have been returned to the caller

get.summary: Returns a required step given the id of a previously completed step.
get.description: A required step contains the fields that need to be completd when submitted the step.

parameters.name: registerId
parameters.description: The id of the register.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the previously completed step to return the next require step for.

200.description: The required step has be succesfully built.

403.description: The caller is not authorized to call this endpoint.

post.summary: Submit a step fullfilment for a step in a process instance.
post.description: This will result in the actor for the next step in the process getting an action.

parameters.name: registerId
parameters.description: The id of the register.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the preevious step in the process instance.

parameters.name: stepFulfillment
parameters.description: The completed step fulfillment.

202.description: The fulfillment has been submited successfully.

403.description: Caller is not authorized to call this endpoint.

post.summary: Allows a step fulfilment to to be saved for later submission.
post.description: When you retrieve the required step from the GET steps/{id}/next endpoint, any saved step data will be included as the "mostRecentValue" against the target fields.

parameters.name: registerId
parameters.description: The id of the register.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the previous step.

parameters.name: stepFulfillment
parameters.description: The step fulfillment to save.

403.description: Caller is not authorized to call this endpoint.

post.summary: Submit a step rejection for a step in a process instance.
post.description: This results in the actor for the previous step getting an action.

parameters.name: registerId
parameters.description: The id of the register.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the step that is being rejected.

parameters.name: stepRejection
parameters.description: Contains an optional comment as to why the step is being rejected.

202.description: Returns a confirmation that the request has been accepted

401.description: User is not authenticated to call this endpoint.

403.description: User is not authorized to call this endpoint.

post.summary: Submit a cancellation request so that the process instance is not continued.
post.description:
This is irreversible, i.e. once a process has been cancelled there is no way of continuing it.
A process can only be cancelled from the first step.
No data will be deleted i.e. all previous transactions will still be viewable and public data in them will still be searchable.
The step will be sent to a dead letter wallet so that no actors in the system have an action for the process instance.

parameters.name: registerId
parameters.description: The id of the register.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the process to dispose of

202.description: The process has been successfully canceled.

403.description: Caller is not authorized to call this endpoint.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The transaction id to look for.

parameters.name: registerId
parameters.description: The register the transaction is saved on.

200.description: The transaction has been found and returned.

400.description: Supplied id is not valid transaction id.

404.description: A transaction matching the ID could not be found.

Bearer.name: Authorization
Bearer.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. Example: "Authorization: Bearer {token}"
